job_details.Functieomschrijving:
AI/ML Full Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

   At AND, we accelerate the development of digital capabilities. In practice, that means helping ambitious leaders and organisations build the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.

   Clients rely on our experience, agility and craft skills across tech and business strategy, software development and product management to address some of the toughest challenges facing their businesses.

   We bring aboard thinkers, tinkerers, passionate software craftspeople and inspiring technologists to help us solve these challenges. Together, we're united by a sense of pragmatism, purpose and a deeply-held belief that digital products and technology alone won't transform a business or save the world: it's the people that count.

   About You

   As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
     *
          + Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
          + Proficiency in Python and Javascript
          + Proficiency in researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
          + Experience working in Azure
          + Solid understanding of vector databases (Azure Cognitive Search, FAISS, Pinecone, etc..)
          + Experience working with GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)
          + Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
          + Understanding of MLOps best practices.
          + Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
          + Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

   It's helpful if you also have:
     * Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps
     * A keen interest in industry best-practice around standards, quality and continuous improvement in the field of Data Science (AI/GenAI/ML)
     * Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics
     * Experience of using modern and traditional data technologies including: ElasticSearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mySQL/mariaDB, etc..

   Language Proficiency
     * Dutch speaker is strongly preferred

   Joining AND

   From the work we deliver, to the way we serve and support our people, we work hard to ensure that there's nowhere quite like AND. But joining a company is a two-way street: the fit has to work on both sides. So before you apply, here's three key things to understand about us:
     * We're built for people - like, real humans. Not 'resources' or 'staff'. That means happiness and wellbeing really do matter to us, and we hate unnecessary hierarchy and bureaucracy.
     * There's no well-trodden path ahead: AND is growing fast and forging a new trail. That's exciting, and gives us all the autonomy and opportunity we love - but bear in mind it also demands focus, patience and resilience.
     * Diversity is a priority. After all, to build great products that a wide variety of different people love to use, we need a wide variety of people to help us build them. So diversity is more than a policy or a word: it's business critical for us.

   Still sound good? Great! Fill out the short application form below and we'll be in touch.

   Over het bedrijf:
   AND Digital
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

AI/ML Full Stack Engineer (Rotterdam)

   At AND, we accelerate the development of digital capabilities. In practice, that means helping ambitious leaders and organisations build the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.

   Clients rely on our experience, agility and craft skills across tech and business strategy, software development and product management to address some of the toughest challenges facing their businesses.

   We bring aboard thinkers, tinkerers, passionate software craftspeople and inspiring technologists to help us solve these challenges. Together, we're united by a sense of pragmatism, purpose and a deeply-held belief that digital products and technology alone won't transform a business or save the world: it's the people that count.

   As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:

          + Experience working in Azure

          + Understanding of MLOps best practices.

     * Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics
     * Experience of using modern and traditional data technologies including: ElasticSearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mySQL/mariaDB, etc..

     * Diversity is a priority. After all, to build great products that a wide variety of different people love to use, we need a wide variety of people to help us build them. So diversity is more than a policy or a word: it's business critical for us.

   Still sound good? Great! Fill out the short application form below and we'll be in touch.

   AND Digital

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building and deploying applications using GenAI tools like ChatGPT and LangChain, along with experience in RAG concepts (implied by vector databases and LLM frameworks). While ML modeling is mentioned, the focus on user-facing APIs and GenAI tools points more towards a GenAI Engineer profile than a pure ML Engineer.

evidence.phrase: helping ambitious leaders and organisations build the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.
evidence.justification: This phrase describes the company's overarching goal of helping clients with their digital transformation and strategic objectives, indicating a need for understanding business context.

evidence.phrase: Clients rely on our experience, agility and craft skills across tech and business strategy, software development and product management to address some of the toughest challenges facing their businesses.
evidence.justification: Highlights the integration of business strategy and addressing client business challenges, requiring business understanding.

evidence.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
evidence.justification: Directly involves understanding and advising on clients' strategic approaches to machine learning.

evidence.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
evidence.justification: Suggests a need to mentor and improve data handling and processing skills within the team.

evidence.phrase: Experience in the field of Data Engineering, Science or Analytics
evidence.justification: Explicitly mentions experience in Data Engineering as a beneficial skill.

evidence.phrase: Experience of using modern and traditional data technologies including: ElasticSearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mySQL/mariaDB, etc..
evidence.justification: Indicates familiarity with various data storage and processing technologies, which are foundational to data engineering.

evidence.phrase: Proficiency in researching, training, building, evaluating, scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
evidence.justification: This is a core description of the modeling lifecycle for traditional ML models.

evidence.phrase: Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
evidence.justification: Lists specific libraries and toolkits used for model development, training, and evaluation.

evidence.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
evidence.justification: Requires a deep understanding of how ML models work mathematically.

evidence.phrase: Experience working with GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)
evidence.justification: Directly relates to working with generative models and their associated APIs/frameworks.

evidence.phrase: AI/ML Senior Full-Stack Engineer
evidence.justification: The title itself indicates a full-stack engineering role, implying software development across the stack.

evidence.phrase: Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
evidence.justification: Focuses on writing code that is ready for production, a key aspect of software development.

evidence.phrase: Proficiency in Python and Javascript
evidence.justification: Specifies programming languages commonly used in full-stack development.

evidence.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
evidence.justification: Directly involves developing and maintaining software interfaces for ML models.

evidence.phrase: building the teams, products, processes and even operational structures they need to close the digital skills gap within their organisation today, so that they thrive tomorrow.
evidence.justification: Implies building and delivering digital products and solutions.

evidence.phrase: Understanding of MLOps best practices.
evidence.justification: Explicitly states the need for understanding MLOps.

evidence.phrase: Proficiency in MLOps and wider DevOps
evidence.justification: Mentions MLOps and DevOps as a desired proficiency, indicating operational aspects of deploying and managing systems.

evidence.phrase: scaling and improving Machine Learning models.
evidence.justification: Scaling models in production is a key MLOps concern.

evidence.phrase: Experience working in Azure
evidence.justification: Azure is a cloud platform that hosts many MLOps services and infrastructure.

evidence.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
evidence.justification: Implies guiding and communicating technical solutions to less experienced team members.

evidence.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
evidence.justification: Requires communication and mentorship to improve others' skills.

evidence.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
evidence.justification: Involves direct interaction and collaboration with clients.

evidence.phrase: work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
evidence.justification: Directly involves client interaction and collaboration.

evidence.phrase: As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams.
evidence.justification: Working across a portfolio of clients and in agile teams suggests a need to adapt to different environments and projects.

evidence.phrase: A keen interest in industry best-practice around standards, quality and continuous improvement in the field of Data Science (AI/GenAI/ML)
evidence.justification: Indicates a need to stay updated with evolving best practices in a fast-paced field.

evidence.phrase: AND is growing fast and forging a new trail. That's exciting, and gives us all the autonomy and opportunity we love - but bear in mind it also demands focus, patience and resilience.
evidence.justification: The company's growth and new trail imply a dynamic environment requiring adaptability.

evidence.phrase: We bring aboard thinkers, tinkerers, passionate software craftspeople and inspiring technologists to help us solve these challenges.

evidence.phrase: Together, we're united by a sense of pragmatism, purpose and a deeply-held belief that digital products and technology alone won't transform a business or save the world: it's the people that count.
evidence.justification: Explicitly mentions pragmatism as a core value.

evidence.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
evidence.justification: Involves troubleshooting and resolving technical issues for team members.

evidence.phrase: We're built for people - like, real humans. Not 'resources' or 'staff'. That means happiness and wellbeing really do matter to us, and we hate unnecessary hierarchy and bureaucracy.
evidence.justification: While not directly AI ethics, it points to a people-centric approach which can extend to responsible AI development.

evidence.phrase: Diversity is a priority. After all, to build great products that a wide variety of different people love to use, we need a wide variety of people to help us build them. So diversity is more than a policy or a word: it's business critical for us.
evidence.justification: Focus on diversity and inclusion in building products can imply a consideration for fairness and bias in AI systems.

evidence.justification: The 'Senior' title often implies taking ownership and driving initiatives.

evidence.phrase: accelerate the development of digital capabilities.
evidence.justification: Suggests a proactive approach to driving progress and innovation.

evidence.phrase: AND is growing fast and forging a new trail. That's exciting, and gives us all the autonomy and opportunity we love - but bear in mind it also demands focus, patience and resilience.
evidence.justification: The mention of forging a new trail and autonomy suggests an environment that values innovation and initiative.
